text:
Thomas George Hooper (born 5 October 1972) is an Academy Award-winning British-Australian movie and television director.
He directed episodes of "Quayside", "Byker Grove", "EastEnders", and "Cold Feet" on British television.
His best known movie director works are "The King's Speech" (2010), "Les Misérables" (2012) and "Cats" (2019).
